b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting:
<script>
    var url = 'https://wati-integration-service.clare.ai/shopifywidget/shopifywidget.js?43370';
    var s = document.createelement('script');
    s.type = 'text/javascript';
    s.async = true;
    s.src = url;
    var options = {
  "enabled":true,
  "chatbuttonsetting":{
      "backgroundcolor":"#4dc247",
      "ctatext":"",
      "borderradius":"25",
      "marginleft":"0",
      "marginbottom":"50",
      "marginright":"50",
      "position":"right"
  },
  "brandsetting":{
      "brandname":"bloggingmafia",
      "brandsubtitle":"typically replies within a day",
      "brandimg":"https://www.bloggingmafia.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/ripon.jpg",
      "welcometext":"hi, there!\nhow can i help you?",
      "messagetext":"hello, *mafia* i have a question.%0a%0a{{page_link}}",
      "backgroundcolor":"#008a73",
      "ctatext":"start chat",
      "borderradius":"25",
      "autoshow":false,
      "phonenumber":"910011223344"
  }
};
    s.onload = function() {
        createwhatsappchatwidget(options);
    };
    var x = document.getelementsbytagname('script')[0];
    x.parentnode.insertbefore(s, x);
</script>
